LayoutXML:
<layout>
  <tabs>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Summary"></lang>
      </text>
      <section showtext="false">
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_STATUS_PRIORITY" colspan="4" showlabel="false" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Status and Priority"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section>
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Key Information"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_NAME" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Opportunity## Name"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_OWNER" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Owner"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_ACCOUNT" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Account##"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_STARTDATE" valign="top" fieldtype="4">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Start On"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_CLOSEDATE" valign="top" fieldtype="4">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Close Date"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_STAGENAME" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Stage"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="OP_STAGEDUEDATE" valign="top" fieldtype="8">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Stage Due Date"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_AMOUNT" valign="top" fieldtype="11">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Amount"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_FORECASTAMOUNT" valign="top" fieldtype="11">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Forecast## Amount"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_DISCOUNT" valign="top" fieldtype="3">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Discount"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_FREIGHTAMOUNT" valign="top" fieldtype="11">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Freight Amount"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="OP_DUTYTAX" valign="top" fieldtype="18">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Duty Tax"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="OP_NETAMOUNT" valign="top" fieldtype="11">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Gross Amount"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="OP_TYPE" valign="top" fieldtype="1">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Opportunity## Type"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="OP_CATEGORY" valign="top" fieldtype="1">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Forecast##"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="OP_TOTALACTIVITIES" valign="top">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Total Activities"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section>
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Classification Information"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_TEAMNAME" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Team"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="1" fieldid="OP_TERRITORYNAME" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Territory##"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="OP_LEADSOURCE" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Lead## Source"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="OP_CAMPAIGN" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Campaign"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="OP_PROBABILITY" valign="top" fieldtype="1">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Probability of Winning"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="OP_TAX" valign="top" fieldtype="18">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Tax"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section containscustominfo="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Additional Information"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="OP_DESCRIPTION" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="9">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Description"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Useful Links"></lang>
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="OP_WEBINTEGRATION_LINKS" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="37" listingtype="0" fieldtype="0">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Web Integration URL Links"></lang>
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
